articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Meta Threads is testing pinned columns on the web, similar to the old TweetDeck - TechCrunch
articles.description: Mark Zuckerberg announced today that the social network is testing pinned columns on the web.
articles.content:
X, formerly Twitter, turned TweetDeck into X Pro and pushed it behind a paywall. But there is a new column-based social media tool in town, and it’s from Instagram Threads.
